review_title: They don't walk the walk or talk the talk

Also, to be more responsive to immediate needs in the programs.

pros: The salary is at the very top in the province of Saskatchewan.  The experience is excellent with my former mentor until he gets layoff one year ago.
cons: As a project engineer, I was doing the work from project definition to project close-out.  It was a big task for 3 million dollars project.  Especially, the company is asking for +/- 10 % budget cap.  It is very impossible to achieve.  But at the end with the help of outside contractors, I was able to achieve few projects that are within the project
